explanation: [0-0] A man in a green hoodie is facing the right side of the video, standing in a room. The room has gray walls and a white door, with a light switch on the wall and a string of light beads hanging next to it. The text "Normal people turning lights off at night:" is written in white at the top of the video.
[0-2] Then the man presses the switch on the wall, the light in the room turns off, then the man faces the camera, shrugs and walks to the right.
[0-2] Then the man presses the switch on the wall, the light in the room turns off, then the man faces the camera, shrugs and walks to the right.

[2-8] Then the light turns on again, with the text "Me:" in white at the top of the video. After the man turns off the switch, he runs quickly to the right. The camera follows behind the man as he runs through a door, swinging his body forward, into a house with counters and windows. Then the man turns left and leaves the frame. Finally, the camera is in front of the man, the picture goes up and down as the man makes exaggerated movements while looking at the camera.
